attributes.action: Seek the permission of Her Majesty the Queen to dissolve parliament and call a General Election as soon as practicable after June 4 2009
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The country has lost faith in the Prime Minister, the Government, the House, and its Speaker to take the necessary actions urgently to address the malaise affecting our democratic institutions and undermining confidence in the political process. To install an interim Prime Minister without recourse to the country would cause further damage. An immediate general election is the best hope of restoring the trust and faith of the governed in those who govern us.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
